scripts.dev: concurrently -k -n web,api "npm run dev -w apps/web" "npm run dev -w apps/api"
scripts.build: npm run build -w apps/web && npm run build -w apps/api
scripts.lint: npm run lint -w apps/web || true && npm run lint -w apps/api || true
scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck -w apps/web || true && npm run typecheck -w apps/api || true
